public class SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner
extends org.junit.runners.Suite

A test runner that runs a test case as a suite of tests.

1.0.0

SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner

public SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner(Class<?> klass)
                          throws org.junit.runners.model.InitializationError
Creates a SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner to run the test cases encapsulated within klass.

Parameters:
klass - The class that encapsulates the test cases.
Throws:
org.junit.runners.model.InitializationError - If there was an error initialising the test runner.
